meanings: marriage, wedding, union, matrimony, 결혼하다 marry (a person) , get[be] married (to), wed
[명사] marriage, (formal) matrimony, [동사] marry, be[get] married (to), (informal) get hitched, (신문 용어) wed
international marriage, (다른 인종 간의) interracial marriage, mixed marriage
